metadata.title: CVE-2021-32037 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An authorized user may trigger an invariant which may result in denial ofservice or server exit if a relevant aggregation request is sent to ashard. Usually, the requests are sent via mongos and special privileges arerequired in order to know the address of the shards and to log in to theshards of an auth enabled environment.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
